wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Fraser is a British actor. He trained at the Central School of Speech and Drama. He is generally known for playing one of the lead characters in Frequencies (OXV: The Manual), Scar Tissue, The Patrol and Lab Rats. Although a greater part of his acting is done on stage. He also voiced the character of Magnai in the 2017 Final Fantasy online expansion, ‘Stormblood.’

response: *Daniel Fraser (rugby) (fl. 1902–1909), New Zealand rugby league international

* Daniel Fraser as Lieutenant Jonathan Bradshaw

Frequencies, also known as OXV: The Manual, is a 2013 independent British science fiction romance, thriller film written and directed by Darren Paul Fisher. The film stars Daniel Fraser, Eleanor Wyld, and Owen Pugh. The film takes place in a world where human worth and emotional connections are determined by set "frequencies". The film was produced by Fisher and Alice Hazel Henley, and released on 24 July 2013.
